item.title: Machine Learning for the Masses: Naive Bayes (pt.2)
item.description: The main purpose of this part is for anyone reading it to see that there is not a single way to create a model.

item.title: Introducing A day In life Podcast
item.description: A quick introduction of this blog and its purpose and goals.

item.title: Just enough to get you started with Apache Spark
item.description: When Big Data became a thing some years ago, I tried several frameworks, platforms and technologies. Most, if not all of them were not so good at hiding their inherent distributed nature, which caused a steep learning curve and increased complexity.

item.title: Machine Learning for the Masses: Naive Bayes (pt.1)
item.description: Machine learning doesnâ€™t have to be or seem complicated. It can get as straight-forward as counting and multiplying, which is the case with Naive Bayes.
